subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Deuce McAllister is the Saints’ career rushing leader, with 5,678 yards, despite missing most of the 2005 season with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee and the 2007 season.
snippet: Deuce McAllister is the Saints’ career rushing leader, with 5,678 yards, despite missing most of the 2005 season with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee and the 2007 season.
